description: To demolish buildings with partial facade retention of 70-90 Pall Mall and redevelop site by the erection of a three to twenty storey mixed use development comprising: 472 no. residential apartments (161 no. studios, 83 no. one bedroom, 207 no. two bedroom and 6 no. three bedroom apartments and 15 no. duplexes); 30 no. live-work units (with 1,215 m2 of work use floorspace within Use Classes A1, B1 and D1 - medical/health related, but no more than 587 m2 of A1 retail floorspace); 544 m2 of separate work uses (Use Classes A1, B1 and D1 - medical/health related) and 3,330 m2 of mixed commercial floorspace (including: 420 m2 of B1a Office use, 450 m2 of A1 Retail use, 420 m2, D2 Gymnasium with 350 m2 of associated external space, 700 m2 D2 Spa (150 m2 A3/A4 cafe/restaurant/bar and 840 m2 A3 restaurant; along with residential roof terraces, landscaped public realm, building concierge and support facilities and a 478 no. space multi-storey car park; all accessed from Pall Mall.  **Amended plans received showing a revised configuration of building uses and additional supporting information provided**.
